## SearchService interface

A service which performs Yext Answers searches

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SearchService 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [universalSearch(request)](./answers-core.searchservice.universalsearch.md) | Performs a Universal search across all verticals. |
|  [verticalSearch(request)](./answers-core.searchservice.verticalsearch.md) | Performs a search across a particular Vertical. |
